muves

Muves is a multilingual vector search project created and maintained by Aarne Talman for learning and demo purposes.

Learn more

About

Muves uses multilingual Sentence Transformers for encodings and FAISS vector similarity search for indexing and searching. Muves supports over 50 languages.
